extension.description: A ListItem Helper service which provides values from OMDb/TMDb.[CR][CR][COLOR=red]![/COLOR] Entering OMDb/TMDb API keys in the configuration dialog is required.[CR][CR]Property names:[CR](home) ListItemHelper.rating.rottentomatoes.percent[CR](home) ListItemHelper.rating.rottentomatoes.image[CR](home) ListItemHelper.rating.rottentomatoes.url[CR](home) ListItemHelper.rating.rottentomatoes.audience[CR](home) ListItemHelper.rating.metacritic.percent[CR](home) ListItemHelper.rating.imdb.percent[CR](home) ListItemHelper.rating.imdb[CR](home) ListItemHelper.rating.imdb.votes[CR](home) ListItemHelper.awards[CR](home) ListItemHelper.budget[CR](home) ListItemHelper.budget.million[CR](home) ListItemHelper.budget.formatted[CR](home) ListItemHelper.revenue[CR](home) ListItemHelper.revenue.million[CR](home) ListItemHelper.revenue.formatted[CR](home) ListItemHelper.revenue.boxoffice[CR](home) ListItemHelper.DBID[CR](home) ListItemHelper.IMDBNumber[CR][CR]For use with other containers like home screen widgets set the following properties:[CR][CR](home) ListItemHelper.WidgetContainerId[CR]to the container ID (Example: 8000)[CR](home) ListItemHelper.WidgetContainerWindowName[CR]to the window name where the container resides (Example: home)[CR][CR]Important remarks:[CR]- Unset the WidgetContainer-properties when leaving focus from the widget.[CR][CR]Known supported Skins:[CR]A Confluence ZEITGEIST[CR][CR][CR][COLOR=gray]This addon contains forked code of marcelveldt addon script.module.metadatautils which has been changed and massively stripped down for fast execution and minimal functionality.[CR] [/COLOR]
